snippet: Miguel Batista has signed with the Mets for the 2012 season; his role has yet to be determined.
abstract: Miguel Batista has signed with the Mets for the 2012 season; his role has yet to be determined.
lead_paragraph: Miguel Batista pitched the final game of the 2011 season for the Mets, beating Cincinnati, 3-0, at age 40 to become the oldest pitcher in franchise history to throw a shutout. Now Batista will try to see what he can do for the Mets at 41. Batista has signed with them for the 2012 season; his role has yet to be determined.
